reviews.text:
Big portion, good price, delicious, quick service.

Croquetas with ham was very good, with big pieces of ham and cheese.

We ordered also half-portion of sollomito al whisky and the portion was cery big! Highly recommended!

Fun place to sit outside, with friendly waiters who can speak a bit of English. No reservation needed and would recommend the place!

Went for lunch and had 1 glad of wine (they had several options on the card per glas) and 1 port like drink.

For food, 1 small tapas and 1 plate:
1) callenoni of meat: fun dish, the pulled meat inside was of grate taste (8/10)
2) variety of Iberico: a super fun dish to eat with some bread (9/10), would highly recommend this one.

Heads-Up, even when they put the bread automatically on the table, you have to pay a small amount for it.

Would recommend the place, kind service who help you picking the food and drinks upon request  and quick waiting.

Friendly, efficient service and a yummy selection of dishes and drinks made this a good find on a hot day of exploring the city.  Menus were available in different languages and our server was kind and patient as we worked through all our questions ðŸ˜…

Great tapas place at the hearth of Sevilla! They offer a great variety of traditional tapas and also have their own creations, like the meat with carbonara sauce...delicious! Prices are quite low considering the location. Service was great and fast! They have an interesting table booking system. You go to the door and ask for a table. They will write down your name and number and send you a whatsapp when your table is ready.

Friendly and welcoming service.
Food ? Tasted like they served up Aldiâ€™s ready-to-eat section.
